translation: n.工资；报酬v.开展；从事；进行(战争、运动)
examples: (1) A postman's wages are 180 per week.(2) In our family both my husband and I are wage earners.(3) In order to circumvent the straitjacket of national wage rates, employers in many cities offer non-pecuniary rewards to their workers.(4) I am saying that in most cases, if you were to look at a pure dollar-per-hour "wage," you would find that many bloggers work rather inexpensively.(5) The government is waging a campaign against sex discrimination in industry.(6) The government has pledged itself to wage a war against poverty and disease.(7) No country wants to wage a nuclear war.
(1) 邮递员的工资为每周180英镑。(2) 在我们家里，丈夫和我都挣工资。(3) 为了避免全国工资率的约束，许多城市的雇主不以金钱的形式付给工人报酬。(4) 而是说大部分情况下，如果你在看一份一小时只有一美元报酬的工作，那么你会发现很多博客在廉价工作。(5) 政府正在展开反对工业界性别歧视的运动。(6) 政府发誓要进行一场消灭贫穷和疾病的斗争。(7) 哪个国家也不想打核战争。

translation: n.腰部；腰
examples: (1) Her hair nearly reached down to her waist.(2) She wears a ribbon belt round her waist.(3) If the skirt is too big, we can take in the waist.(4) He put his arm around her waist.(5) The uncut grass came up to her waist.
(1) 她的头发几乎垂到了腰部。(2) 她在腰部束了一条缎带。(3) 要是裙子太大了，我们可以把腰部收紧一些。(4) 他搂住了她的腰。(5) 未割的草齐了她的腰。

translation: n.等候室
examples: (1) We were shown into the waiting room.(2) She's been sitting in the waiting room since two-thirty.
(1) 我们被领进等候室。(2) 自两点半她就坐在等候室了。

translation: n.女侍者；女服务员
examples: (1) The waitress received a handsome tip.(2) A waitress came in, carrying tea on a tray.(3) A waitress put a glass of water in front of him.(4) The waitress brought us two pats of butter.
(1) 女侍者收到了数量可观的小费。(2) 一名女侍者走进来，手端放着茶的托盘。(3) 一名女服务员迎上来在他面前放了一杯水。(4) 女服务员给我们端来两小块黄油。

translation: n.随身听
examples: (1) Those teenagers ripped off my walkman.(2) This walkman only needs one battery.
(1) 那些少年偷了我的随身听。(2) 这款随身听只需要一节电池。

translation: n.核桃；核桃木；核桃色；茶色
examples: (1) Walnut is a local specialty here.(2) Fruit trees, large patio area, Walnut school dist.(3) The dining table and chairs are all in black walnut.
(1) 核桃是此地的土特产。(2) 果树，庭院面积大，是属于核桃学区。(3) 餐桌及椅子都是黑核桃木的。

translation: vi.漫步；蜿蜒；迷路；闲逛；徘徊vt.漫步于n.漫游；徘徊；闲逛
examples: (1) He likes to wander over the countryside.(2) The river wanders through some beautiful country.(3) I like to wander in the park after dinner.(4) The boy was wandering around.(5) The travelers are wandering the forests and fields.(6) She went for a little wander round the park.(7) I went to the park and had a wander around.(8) I wander in the passageway, the school is empty.(9) You wander upon the remains of an weathered shrine.(10) I went to the park and had a wander around.
(1) 他喜欢在乡间漫步。(2) 这条河蜿蜒曲折地流经一些风景秀丽的乡村。(3) 我喜欢晚饭后在公园里闲逛。(4) 男孩在那周围徘徊。(5) 旅行者漫步穿过森林与田野。(6) 她到公园去遛达遛达。(7) 我去公园转了一圈。(8) 我在学校的走廊里徘徊。(9) 你在这个风化的神殿的废墟上徘徊。(10) 我去公园转了一圈。

translation: n.病房；行政区；监护；守卫；受监护人vt.守护；躲开
examples: (1) The hospital has a medical ward and a surgical ward.(2) The patient lay quietly on his bed in the medical ward.(3) There are two nurses in the ward.(4) They phoned to every ward and suburb.(5) Which ward does he represent on the council?(6) The child was made a ward of court.(7) The soldiers kept watch and ward over the castle.(8) She invested the money on behalf of her ward.(9) The soldiers warded over the city.(10) He managed to ward off the blow.(11) You should learn how to ward off blows.
(1) 这医院有内科病房和外科病房。(2) 病人安静地躺在内科病房的床上。(3) 病房里有两个护士。(4) 他们给各城区和郊区打电话。(5) 在理事会中他代表哪个区?(6) 那个孩子由法院监护。(7) 士兵们守卫这个城堡。(8) 她代表受她监护的人投资。(9) 士兵们守护着这座城市。(10) 他设法避过了那一击。(11) 你应该学会如何避开打击。

translation: n.仓库vt.存入仓库
examples: (1) They stored their goods in a warehouse.(2) They operate three factories and a huge warehouse.(3) If necessary, please warehouse the goods.
(1) 他们把货物储存在一个仓库里。(2) 他们经营三家工厂和一个大仓库。(3) 如有必要，请将该货存入仓库。

translation: adj.热诚的；热心的
examples: (1) Aunt Sue is a very warm person.(2) Warm professionals were not easy to come by.(3) Columbus found a warm supporter in the Queen.
(1) 苏阿姨是个极为热诚的人。(2) 热心的内行是不容易碰上的。(3) 哥伦布发现王后是位热心的支持者。

translation: n.温暖；热烈；热情；热心
examples: (1) The sun gives (us) warmth and light.(2) She sheds warmth and happiness around her.(3) He was pleased by the warmth of his welcome.(4) He was touched by the warmth of their welcome.(5) The hall effuses warmth and hospitality.(6) What sets him apart is his warmth and sincerity.
(1) 太阳供给我们光和热。(2) 她给周围的人带来温暖兴幸福。(3) 他因受到热烈欢迎而高兴。(4) 他受到他们热情欢迎，十分感动。(5) 大厅里洋溢着热情友好的气氛。(6) 所不同的是他有一颗赤热的心。

translation: n.警告；警报；预兆adj.警告的；告诫的
examples: (1) I flashed a warning glance at them.(2) A gale warning has just been put out.(3) We battened down at the first hurricane warning.(4) There was no advance warning before the earthquake hit.(5) But without any warning, Mount Vesuvius roared to life.(6) When I give out a warning you'd best take heed.
(1) 我向他们投去警告性的一瞥。(2) 刚才发出了大风警报。(3) 飓风警报一发出我们就封舱了。(4) 地震之前没有任何预兆。(5) 然而，在没有任何预兆的情况下，维苏威火山咆哮着苏醒了。(6) 我发出警告的时候你最好听仔细了。

translation: n.洗衣机
examples: (1) The salesperson demonstrated a new washing machine.(2) Washers are for washing clothes.
(1) 推销员示范操作新的洗衣机。(2) 洗衣机是洗衣服用的。

translation: n.西瓜
examples: (1) This kind of watermelon is remarkable for its size.(2) The hostess iced the watermelon.
(1) 这种西瓜个头儿大。(2) 女主人把西瓜冰镇上了。

translation: n.蜡；蜂蜡vt.(用蜡)涂vi.变圆
examples: (1) Blobs of wax covered the candlestick.(2) He is modeling a unicorn in wax .(3) They bought wax and honey up by the great.(4) Why did she have to wax the floors herself?(5) The moon is waxing.
(1) 烛台上全是一团团的蜡。(2) 他在用蜡制作独角兽。(3) 他们大量购进蜜蜡和蜂蜜。(4) 她干什么非要自己动手给地板打腊?(5) 月亮越来越圆。

translation: n.路旁adj.路旁的
examples: (1) By the wayside stood a huge tree.(2) They put up a board on the wayside.
(1) 路旁矗立著一棵大树。(2) 他们路旁竖起了一个牌子。

translation: n.网；网络；网状物；腹板vi.结网vt.结网于；使陷入罗网
examples: (1) A spider weaves a web to catch prey.(2) The tiger was enmeshed in the web laid by hunter.(3) Do you think art and design are melding on the web?(4) He breathlessly watched the spider attempt to spin its web for the third time.(5) Do you think that the spider can web anything?
(1) 蜘蛛为捕猎昆虫而织网。(2) 老虎缠在猎人布下的网里。(3) 你认为在网络上艺术和设计是相结合的吗？(4) 他凝神屏息地观看那蜘蛛试图第三次结网。(5) 你觉得这蜘蛛能用网捕住什么吗?

translation: n.网站
examples: (1) You can visit its website on the Internet.(2) Can you recommend a good website?(3) This page includes lots of links to other websites you may find interesting.
(1) 你可以访问它的网站。(2) 你能给我推荐一个好的网站吗?(3) 这个网页包括很多链接,可以链接到其它有趣的网站。

translation: n.软弱；弱点；嗜好
examples: (1) Don't take his patience as a sign of weakness.(2) She thoroughly despised him for his weakness.(3) Forehand return is my greatest weakness.(4) There is an inherent weakness in the design.(5) The book's weakness is the author's inability to sustain an argument.(6) Women have a weakness for shopping.(7) His weakness for cigarettes is detrimental to his health.
(1) 别把他的耐心看作软弱的表示。(2) 她因为他的软弱而十分鄙视他。(3) 正手回球是我最大的弱点。(4) 这设计本身存在弱点。(5) 该书的缺点在于作者未能把论证展开。(6) 女士都有爱逛街的嗜好。(7) 他抽烟的嗜好对他的身体有害。

translation: n.【U】财富；财产；丰富；大量
examples: (1) Health is better than wealth.(2) He's always flaunting his wealth.(3) She is responsible for the character part of the hero's devoted mother.(4) He has gambled away all his wealth.(5) She is not to be compared with you in wealth.(6) There's a wealth of books in the library.(7) Jim has a whole wealth of teaching experience.(8) Wealth allows them to be indulged in abundance.(9) She married a man of untold wealth.
(1) 【谚】健康胜于财富。(2) 他总是摆阔。(3) 她负责这个主人公的忠诚的母亲的角色部分。(4) 他赌博输掉了全部财产。(5) 她的财产不能与你相比。(6) 这个图书馆藏书丰富。(7) 吉姆具有丰富的教学经验。(8) 而现在，物质的丰富使人们可以享受大量的这些东西。(9) 她嫁了一个拥有大量财富的人。

translation: adj.富有的n.富人
examples: (1) She's an attractive woman, and wealthy to boot.(2) A wealthy sponsor came to our rescue with a generous donation.(3) He was the son of a wealthy planter.(4) She married her daughter to a wealthy man.(5) Obama says those cuts favor the wealthy.
(1) 她是个很有魅力的女人，而且很富有。(2) 有个富有的赞助人慷慨捐赠来解救我们。(3) 他是一个富有的种植园主的儿子。(4) 她把她女儿嫁给了一个富人。(5) 说这些政策只会对富人有利。

translation: n.气象工作者；天气预报员
examples: (1) The weatherman suggested that people not use Highway 7.(2) The weatherman predicted a freeze for tonight.
(1) 气象员建议人们不要使用7号公路。(2) 天气预报员预报今晚有冰冻。

translation: n.婚礼；结合
examples: (1) We decided to delay our wedding until next year.(2) She reproached her husband for having forgotten their wedding anniversary.(3) The coalition government was obviously a shotgun wedding.
(1) 我们决定把婚礼推迟到明年。(2) 她责怪丈夫忘了他们的结婚周年纪念日。(3) 这个联合政府显然是勉强的结合。

translation: n.杂草；野草n.衣服；丧服vi.除草；清除；淘汰
examples: (1) The garden is choked with weeds.(2) She knelt down to pull a weed from the flower bed.(3) There are so many weeds in his field!(4) He pulled off his coat and started to weed with us.(5) Tomorrow I have to weed the garden.(6) We must weed out the traitors in our midst!(7) We have to weed out unqualified applicants.
(1) 花园杂草丛生。(2) 她跪下来拔除花圃上的杂草。(3) 他的田里有那么多野草！(4) 他脱去上装，开始和我们一起除草。(5) 我明天得给花园除草。(6) 我们必须清除我们中间的叛徒!(7) 我们必须淘汰不合格的申请人。

translation: adj.每周的；一周一次的；周刊的n.周刊；周报adv.每周；一周一次
examples: (1) We should work out what our weekly costs are.(2) The child has a weekly allowance of five dollars.(3) I'll have to discontinue these weekly visits.(4) Shall we assign Thursdays for our weekly meetings?(5) The newsman jazzed up the story to sell himself to the editor of the weekly.(6) There is an interesting article in this weekly.(7) The weekly makes a feature of drug abuse.(8) This weekly is printed every Friday.(9) We played chess two or three times weekly.(10) John goes there fortnightly instead of weekly.
(1) 我们应该算出我们每周的花费。(2) 这孩子每星期有五元零用钱。(3) 我每周一次的访问得停止了。(4) 我们把每周例会定在星期四好吗?(5) 这位记者把报道写得绘声绘色，以求博得那家周刊的青睐。(6) 这期的周刊上有一篇有趣的文章。(7) 该周刊做了药物滥用的专题报导。(8) 这份周报每星期五印刷。(9) 我们每周下两三次棋。(10) 约翰并非每周去那儿，只是隔周去一次。

translation: v.流泪；哭泣；悲叹；渗出n.哭泣；眼泪
examples: (1) She wept bitter tears over her lost youth.(2) It is better to laugh than (to) weep.(3) I weep for the loss of your husband.(4) Evil men should weep for their evil deeds.(5) The father wept the death of his child.(6) His wound is weeping.(7) good weep would probably make you feel better.
(1) 她为自己逝去的青春痛苦地流泪。(2) 笑比哭好。(3) 我为你失去丈夫而哭泣。(4) 作恶的人应为他们的恶行感到悲哀。(5) 父亲为孩子的死而悲叹。(6) 他的伤口在出血。(7) 你痛痛快快哭上阵也许就好受些了。

translation: v.衡量；称(重量)；重达 ...
examples: (1) He weighed the ideas in his mind.(2) It's been weighing on my mind for days whether to tell her or not.(3) The branches of the trees were weighed down by snow.(4) He weighed in at several pounds below the limit.(5) Some of the stones weigh twenty-six tons!(6) A full-grown elephant can weigh over 6,000 kilograms.
(1) 他在脑中权衡着这些想法。(2) 我这几天心烦意乱，不知道应该不应告诉她。(3) 树枝被雪压弯了。(4) 他赛前量体重比规定限度少几磅。(5) 有些石头重达二十六吨！(6) 一头成年大象能重达六千多公斤。

translation: n.重量；体重；重任；重要vt.使 ... 负重；使倾斜
examples: (1) The pillars have to support the weight of the roof.(2) He gained some weight recently.(3) He has put on weight since I last saw him.(4) The full weight of decision-making falls on her.(5) The President swings his weight to get laws passed.(6) His opinion doesn't carry much weight.(7) The loss of the money has been a weight on my mind.(8) The true giants weight nearly a ton(9) We'll weight up the consequences of the action.
(1) 这些柱子须承受屋顶的重量。(2) 近来，他的体重增加了。(3) 自从我上次见到他以来，他又长胖了。(4) 决策的重任全落在她的肩上了。(5) 总统运用权力使法律获得通过。(6) 他的意见没多少影响。(7) 丢钱的事总是压在我心里。(8) 这个真正的巨人的重量约达一吨(9) 我们将评价这一行动的后果。

translation: n.福利；福利事业；幸福
examples: (1) The welfare of the individual is bound up with the welfare of the community.(2) These are matters that bear on the welfare of the community.(3) The government decided to promote public welfare.(4) My principal concern is my family's welfare.
(1) 个人的福利与社会的福利有着密切的关系。(2) 这些都是与社会福利有关的问题。(3) 政府决定发展公共福利。(4) 我至为关心的是我一家的幸福。

translation: adj.出名的；众所周知的
examples: (1) He is little known as an artist.(2) Our silks are known for good quality.(3) His championship of women's rights is well known.(4) Auroras are known to have many shapes and colors.
(1) 他是个不出名的艺术家。(2) 我们的丝绸是以质量出名的。(3) 他提倡女权是众所周知的。(4) 众所周知的是极光有许多形状和颜色。

translation: n.西方人；（美国的）西部人
examples: (1) See from his face, he looks like an Asian more than a westerner.
(1) 从面孔上看并不太像西方人，倒是更像我们亚洲人。

translation: adv.向西
examples: (1) The ship drifted westwards in the strong wind.
(1) 船在强风中向西漂移。

translation: n.鲸vi.捕鲸v.打击
examples: (1) We may live to see the extinction of the whale.(2) The whale thrashed the water with its tail.(3) The blue whale is the world's largest living animal.(4) He used to whale me when he was sober and could get his hands on me.
(1) 人类或许能亲眼见到鲸的灭绝。(2) 那条鲸鱼不住地用尾巴击水。(3) 蓝鲸是当今最大的动物。(4) 他从前没喝醉的时候，只要能抓住我，总要打我一通。

translation: pron.无论什么；任何事物adj.不管怎样的；所有的；丝毫的
examples: (1) We shall remain friends whatever may betide.(2) Whatever nonsense the papers print, some people always believe it.(3) Whatever requests you make will be granted.(4) She applied whatever strength she had left to the task.(5) No campers whatever may use the lake before noon.
(1) 无论发生什么事，我们将永远是朋友。(2) 不管报纸胡说什么,总有一些人信以为真。(3) 你提的任何请求都会得到许可(4) 她将所有剩下的精力都用到这项任务上。(5) 不管什么宿营者,都不许在中午前使用这个湖。

translation: adj.无论哪个；无论哪些pron.无论哪个
examples: (1) Whichever nation explodes an atomic bomb will engage the whole world in war.(2) Whichever nation explodes an atomic bomb will engage the whole world in war.
(1) 无论哪个国家使用原子弹都会使全世界卷入战争。(2) 无论哪个国家使用原子弹都会使全世界卷入战争。

translation: n.低语；窃窃私语；飒飒的声音vi.低声说；窃窃私语；飒飒地响vt.耳语；私语
examples: (1) She said it in a whisper, so I didn't hear.(2) I heard the whisper of wind in the pines.(3) The children were whispering in the corner.(4) You'll have to whisper or he'll hear you.(5) She whisper to me so no one else will hear.(6) It is bad manners to whisper in company.(7) Don't you know it's rude to whisper?(8) The wind was whispering in the roof.(9) Fatso leaned over to whisper in her ear.(10) They love to whisper intimately.(11) When the teacher turned around , they began to whisper.
(1) 她是悄声说的，所以我没有听见。(2) 我听见风吹过松林间飒飒作响。(3) 孩子们正在角落里低声耳语。(4) 你们得低声说,否则他会听到。(5) 她低声跟我说话以免别人听见。(6) 在众人面前窃窃私语是不礼貌的行为。(7) 难道你不知道窃窃私语是不礼貌的吗?(8) 屋顶上风声飒飒。(9) 胖子欠身对她耳语几句。(10) 他们爱亲密地耳语。(11) 老师一转过身去，他们就开始窃窃私语。

translation: n.口哨；汽笛；警笛v.吹口哨；鸣汽笛；呼啸；吹口哨召唤
examples: (1) The whistle goes at the end of the match.(2) He gave a loud whistle of gladness.(3) The whistle went and the man knocked off for lunch.(4) The horse shied at the shrill whistle.(5) The little boy rounded his lips to whistle.(6) The referee whistled and the game began.(7) He whistled to his friend to keep hidden.(8) We used to hear the train whistle at night.(9) A bullet whistled past his head.(10) The wind whistled through a crack in the door.
(1) 比赛结束时哨声响了。(2) 他吹了一声响亮的口号表示高兴。(3) 汽笛响了，工人们停工午餐。(4) 那匹马听到刺耳的汽笛声，惊得往后倒退。(5) 那个小男孩把双唇收圆好吹口哨。(6) 裁判哨子一响，比赛开始了。(7) 他吹口哨通知朋友继续隐蔽。(8) 过去我们常会在晚上听到火车的汽笛声。(9) 一颗子弹从他头顶上呼啸而过。(10) 风从门的裂缝中呼呼地刮了进来。

translation: adj.分布(或散布)广的；普遍的
examples: (1) The high cost prohibits the widespread use of the drug.(2) Widespread flooding is affecting large areas of Devon.(3) The Government acted quickly to relieve the widespread distress caused by the earthquake.(4) The new laws gained widespread acceptance.(5) English is more widespread and more used in international intercourse than German.(6) The news of the radiation leak caused widespread public alarm.
(1) 该药因价格昂贵而影响其被广泛应用。(2) 洪水泛滥，淹没了德文郡的广大地区。(3) 地震造成大范围的灾难,政府迅速采取行动赈济灾民。(4) 新法例广获赞同。(5) 英语在国际交往中比德语使用得更为广泛。(6) 辐射泄露的消息引起了公众的普遍恐慌。

translation: adj.野生的；野蛮的；未开发的；狂热的adv.胡乱地；失去控制地n.荒野；荒地
examples: (1) In nature, all animals are wild and free.(2) North America has the world's best climate for wild grapes.(3) I was living like a wild child.(4) Nothing is sacred to these wild youths.(5) He is wild to see the film star.(6) You can't make wild accusations like that!(7) Danger in the wild comes from the carnivores.(8) There's a wild stretch of land behind the house.(9) The village people are planting trees to turn the wild into a beautiful garden.
(1) 在自然界，一切动物都是野生的，自由自在的。(2) 北美的气候是世界上最适合野生葡萄生长的。(3) 我的行为像个野蛮的孩子。(4) 这些狂野的年轻人什么都不尊重。(5) 他一心想见一面那位影星。(6) 你不能这样胡乱地指责别人。(7) 荒野地带的危险来自食肉动物。(8) 房子后面有一大片荒地。(9) 村民们植树要把荒地变成美丽的花园。

translation: n.野生动植物adj.野生动植物的
examples: (1) This area was once a wildlife reserve.(2) Hunters are barred from wildlife sanctuaries.
(1) 该地区曾是一个野生动物保护区。(2) 野生动物保护区内禁止狩猎。

translation: adj.愿意的；心甘情愿的
examples: (1) Are you willing to help?(2) I don't know whether he is willing to come.(3) The spirit is willing but the flesh is weak.(4) I'd like to buy your house if you are willing to sell it.(5) I wouldn't be willing.(6) He is always a willing helper.(7) She's the willing horse in the office and so gets given most of the work to do.
(1) 你愿意帮忙吗？(2) 我不知道他是否愿意来。(3) 心有余而力不足。(4) 如果你愿意卖的话，我想买你的房子。(5) 我不会愿意的。(6) 他是一个乐于帮忙的人。(7) 她是办公室里埋头苦干的人，大部分的工作都交给她去做。

translation: adv.乐意地；心甘情愿地
examples: (1) He listened to reason and willingly accepted his comrades'opinions and criticisms.(2) If you won't do it willingly,I'll make you do it.
(1) 他听从劝告，乐意地接受了同志们的意见和批评。(2) 如果你不心甘情愿地干，我就强迫你干。

translation: n.乐意；愿意
examples: (1) I expressed my willingness to support the cause.(2) They tried to assure him of their willingness to work.(3) They manifested much willingness to go.
(1) 我表示乐意支持该项运动。(2) 他们尽力使他相信他们乐意工作。(3) 他们表示很愿意去。

translation: n.防风上衣的一种；商标名；防风林
examples: (1) I want to buy a windbreaker so that I will look more handsome.
(1) 我想买一件风衣，以便使我看起来更帅。

translation: n.翅膀；翼v.飞过；空运；临时发挥
examples: (1) The hen tucked her head under her wing.(2) A seagull fluttered down with an injured wing.(3) Wild gooses wing regularly,haste and idle.(4) I lost my lecture notes, so I had to wing it.
(1) 那母鸡把头缩在翅膀下。(2) 一只海鸥拍打着翅膀飞落下来。(3) 大雁整齐地飞过(4) 我把讲稿弄丢了，所以只得即兴说几句了。

translation: v.擦；揩；抹；拭去；消除；用力打n.擦拭；抹布
examples: (1) She wiped her tears away.(2) I wiped my shoes on the mat before I came in.(3) When you have washed the car , wipe it down well .(4) He tried to wipe out the memory of his former girlfriend.(5) How could I trace your hair to wipe your tears?My hands reached out, catching nothing but a raindrop, on a leaf that had withered.(6) Only in this way can we wipe out the enemy troops.(7) He wiped me with his fist.(8) Please give the table mats a quick wipe.(9) Please wipe the table with a dry cloth.(10) Life is like a mop, using today to mop up yesterday and wipe out tomorrow.
(1) 她擦掉了眼泪。(2) 我在进门前把鞋在垫子上擦了擦。(3) 你把汽车冲洗过后，要好好用布揩拭一下。(4) 他试图抹去对前任女友的回忆。(5) 多想摩娑你的发，温柔地拭去你的眼泪，我伸出手，却只碰到枯叶上的一滴落雨！(6) 只有用这样的方法我们才能消灭敌军。(7) 他用拳头打我。(8) 请把桌上的盘碗垫擦一下。(9) 请用乾抹布擦桌子。(10) 生命就像抹布用今天擦去昨天擦亮明天。

translation: n.金属丝；电线；电报vt.发电报；装电线；(通过电线)接通；用金属丝把...连一起；电汇
examples: (1) The fabric was displayed on a wired stand.(2) The rope was not strong enough, so we used wire.(3) The hot wire is caused by overload.(4) I sent a wire to my mother this morning.(5) Yon can wire the details to my brother in New York.(6) The kids are taught how to wire a plug.(7) As soon as the equipment is wired up, you can use it.(8) The two pieces of wood were wired together.(9) I'd like to wire some money to my son in Seattle.
(1) 那种织物陈列在金属制的架子上。(2) 这根绳子不够结实，所以我们用金属线。(3) 电线发热是由于过载造成的。(4) 今天上午我给母亲打了电话。(5) 你可以将细节电告我在纽约的兄弟。(6) 孩子被教导如何在把电线装进塞子。(7) 这个设备一接通电源你就能用了。(8) 这两块木头已用金属丝捆在一起了。(9) 我想给我在西雅图的儿子电汇一些钱。

translation: n.智慧；明智；才智；聪明；至理名言
examples: (1) She had acquired much wisdom during her long life.(2) He attributes his wisdom to his teachers.(3) We grow in wisdom as we grow older.(4) A flow of words is no proof of wisdom.(5) Confucius's many words are wisdom.
(1) 她经年累月造就了很高的智慧。(2) 他认为他的智慧来自于老师。(3) 我们随着年龄增长而更加明智。(4) 口若悬河，不能证明真有才智。(5) 孔子的很多话都是至理名言。

translation: adj.聪明的；有智慧的；明智的；有见识的
examples: (1) Learned men are not necessarily wise.(2) To a wise person, time is like a diamond.(3) A wise general can gain the upper hand in any battle.(4) She is wise in money matters.(5) You are wise to remain silent.(6) It would be wise not to give undue importance to his criticism.(7) Lord Melbourne replied with a very wise letter.(8) He is the wise man who is the honest man.
(1) 博学者未必都是聪明的。(2) 时间对一个有智慧的人而言，就如钻石般珍贵。(3) 一位有智慧的将军在任何战争中都能占上风。(4) 她善于理财。(5) 你保持沉默，这很明智。(6) 不过份看重他的批评是明智的。(7) 梅尔本爵爷回了一封极有见识的信。(8) 正直的人就是有见识的人。

translation: vt.撤回；取回；撤退；提款vi.撤退；退缩；走开
examples: (1) In view of members reservation and request for further information, the Administration agreed to withdraw the item.(2) He wanted to withdraw his name from the guest list.(3) I'd like to withdraw some money from my account.(4) The troops have been withdrawn from the danger area.(5) He withdrew his horse from the race.(6) Tell the men to withdraw from their new position.(7) He may withdraw into his own private world.(8) He talked to us for an hour and then withdrew.
(1) 鉴于委员有所保留,并要求取得进一步资料,政府当局同意撤回该项目。(2) 他想从客人名单中撤出自己的名字。(3) 我想从户头里提出一些钱。(4) 部队已经撤出危险地带。(5) 他让他的马退出了比赛。(6) 告诉那些人从新的阵地上撤出。(7) 他可以蜷缩在个人的小天地里。(8) 他跟我们谈了一小时的话就走了。

translation: prep.在(某段时间、距离或范围)内；在…里面adv.在…里面n.内部
examples: (1) I'll be coming within an hour.(2) This is a task well within your ability.(3) Several cars are available within this price range.(4) Within these old walls there was once a town.(5) The noise seems to be coming from within the building.(6) He decorated his house within and without.(7) Seen from within, the cave looks larger.
(1) 一小时之内我就会到。(2) 这完全是你力所能及的工作。(3) 在这个价格范围内，有好几种汽车可供选购。(4) 在这些旧城墙里面曾经有一座城市。(5) 吵闹声像是从楼房里传出来的。(6) 他装修房屋的里面和外面。(7) 从内部看这山洞显得比较大些。

translation: n.目击者；证人vt.目击；经历；见证；出席；观察vi.证明；为(宗教信仰)做见证
examples: (1) The witness was telling about the whole accident.(2) The lawyer examined the witness.(3) A material witness failed to appear in court.(4) Did anyone witness the traffic accident?(5) Please the witness to the room on the right.(6) It was an extraordinary experience to witness the first sunrise of the new millennium.(7) Programs look for people with special experience, to witness history, pondering life, against life experience and spiritual secrets of the creation of a novel transcript.(8) Only one witness of the accident has come forward.(9) The witness at the trial had been carefully primed by defence lawyers.(10) You are now the witness or the watcher of the pain-body.(11) The empty cupboard was a witness of his poverty.(12) He is a living witness to my innocence.

(1) 目击者正在讲述整个事故的过程。(2) 律师讯问了证人。(3) 一名重要的证人没有出庭。(4) 有谁目击了这场交通事故？(5) 请把目击证人带到左边的房间。(6) 亲眼目睹千禧年的第一缕曙光是一种与众不同的经历。(7) 节目寻访拥有特殊经历的人物，一起见证历史，思索人生，直指生命的体验与心灵秘密，创造一种新颖的谈话记录。(8) 只有一人站出来为这次事件作见证。(9) 被告律师对出席审讯的证人事先作了仔细的指导。(10) 现在你是痛苦体的目击人或观察者。(11) 空的食橱就是他贫穷的证明。(12) 他是证明我清白的活证人。

translation: n.狼；特立独行的人v.狼吞虎咽
examples: (1) The pups played with the mother wolf.(2) He saw a hungry wolf on the prowl with his telescope.(3) Peter is a good footballer, but he is a lone wolf.(4) I have to wolf down my breakfast, I'm rushed for time.(5) With tears in his eyes, he would watch them wolf it down and mutter to himself, "Poor motherless children!
(1) 小狼们跟母狼玩耍。(2) 他通过望远镜看到了一头四处觅食的饿狼。(3) 彼得是个好足球队员，但他是个不与人合作的人。(4) 我得快点吃完早餐,时间不够了。(5) 看他俩狼吞虎咽的吃那些东西,他眼中含着泪,自言自语的说：“没娘的孩子!”

translation: adj.木制的；生硬笨拙的
examples: (1) There is a wooden porch over the sidewalk.(2) He has two big round new Chinese wooden tables.
(1) 人行道上有一个木制的门廊。(2) 他有两张新的中国式的木制的大圆桌。

translation: v.寻求支持；求爱；求婚
examples: (1) Politicians try to woo the voters before an election.(2) His efforts to woo her to his side proved fruitless.(3) He wooed and won her.(4) I will never try to woo someone with fine car or gift.(5) He wooed four girls before finally marrying one.
(1) 在选举前政治家们都力争选民的支持。(2) 他试图说服她站到自己一边的努力徒劳无功。(3) 他向她求爱成功而结婚。(4) 我绝不会用香车和礼物来求婚。(5) 他在结婚之前曾向四个姑娘求过婚。

translation: n.毛织品adj.羊毛制的
examples: (1) The woollen cloth prickles (my skin).(2) China's woollen textile industry is forging ahead to meet the needs of the country.(3) A man was lying in the box on top of a pile of woollen goods.
(1) 穿毛料衣服(使我的皮肤)有被扎的感觉。(2) 中国的毛纺工业正迅速发展以适应国家的需要。(3) 一个男人躺在箱子里的一堆毛织品上。

translation: n.工作日；工作时间
examples: (1) An ordinary workday is eight hours.(2) Still, there have been times when her workday was upended by a sick child.
(1) 一个工作日通常是八个小时。(2) 尽管如此，有时她的工作日还是会因为孩子生病而被弄得一团乱。

translation: n.劳动力；工人总数；职工总数
examples: (1) Only about half of the original workforce remains.(2) Demographic change is another reason why the workforce is greying.
(1) 只剩下大约原来一半的劳动力。(2) 人口变化是劳动力老龄化的又一原因。

translation: n.同事；工友
examples: (1) We have considered him to be the best workmate.(2) Her workmate is ill and she has to do double work.
(1) 我们一直认为他是我们最好的同事。(2) 她的同事病了,她必须做双倍的工作。

translation: n.工厂；修建；机器部件；全套物品
examples: (1) The steel works has been supplying us with raw material in large quantities.(2) They are repairing the defense works.(3) They expanded the shipyards and started engineering works.(4) We went to the chip shop and had the works: fish, chips, gherkins, mushy peas.
(1) 在过去的两年中，那家钢铁厂一直提供给我们原材料。(2) 他们正在修防御工程。(3) 他们扩建造船厂，开始了工程施工。(4) 我们去薯条店吃了套餐：炸鱼、炸薯条、小黄瓜、豆泥。

translation: adj.世界闻名的
examples: (1) Charles Chaplin is a world famous comedy actor.(2) Her woven goods were universally famous.
(1) 查理卓别林是世界闻名的喜剧演员。(2) 它的纺织品是世界闻名的。

translation: adj.全世界的adv.在全世界
examples: (1) The story has attracted worldwide attention.(2) Gasoline now has an almost worldwide use.(3) Our hotel have a worldwide reputation for good service.(4) Our society expanded into a worldwide organization.(5) The company has worldwide distribution channels.(6) More than 100 million votes were cast worldwide.
(1) 这件事已经引起了全世界的关注。(2) 汽油在全世界范围内被广泛使用。(3) 我们出色的饭店服务享誉世界。(4) 我们的协会扩大成一个世界性组织。(5) 这家公司拥有遍布全世界的销售网络。(6) 全世界投票总数超过1亿。

translation: adj.用旧的；穿坏的；精疲力竭的；憔悴的动词wear的过去分词形式
examples: (1) The worn brakes require replacement.(2) His worn jacket revealed his elbows.(3) They were shivering in thin, worn sweaters.
(1) 磨损的刹车需要替换。(2) 他的破上衣露出了肘部。(3) 他们穿着很薄的破毛衣，冻得发抖。

translation: adj.无价值的；无用的；可鄙的
examples: (1) The worthless books in a library should be weeded out.(2) Those financiers made spoil of widows'money by selling them worthless shares.(3) The old man was cursed with a worthless son.(4) He foolishly spent his winnings on worthless and unnecessary things, and soon he had nothing left.
(1) 应该清除图书馆里无价值的图书。(2) 那些金融家把无价值的股票卖给寡妇们以掠夺她们的钱财。(3) 老人因无用的儿子而感到痛苦。(4) 他傻乎乎地用赢来的钱买了很多没有价值和无用的东西，他因此变得一无所有。

translation: adj.值得(做)的
examples: (1) Thank you for making my visit so worthwhile. I shall treasure your friendship and kind hospitality you have given me.(2) That's worthwhile.
(1) 感谢你们使我的访问如此有价值。我将珍惜我们之间的友谊及你们给予我的盛情款待。(2) 那是值得的。

translation: adj.有价值的；可尊敬的；值得的；配得上的n.知名人士；杰出人物
examples: (1) This is a worthy English-Chinese dictionary.(2) This book is worthy of reading.(3) No man thinks more highly than I do of the patriotism, as well as abilities, of the very worthy gentlemen who have just addressed the house.(4) Mr. Foker himself is a worthy man, though not of high extraction or indeed much education.(5) The event is worthy of being remembered.(6) His behavior is worthy of praise.(7) The book is well worthy of his reputation.(8) I want you to sell these two and find more worthy replacements.
(1) 这是一本有价值的英汉词典。(2) 这本书值得一读。(3) 没有人比我对刚刚向议会全体代表发言的可尊敬的先生们的爱国精神和才干更钦佩了。(4) 福克先生本人也是值得尊敬的,尽管他出身不太高贵,受的教育确实也有限。(5) 那事件是值得记忆的。(6) 他的行为值得称道。(7) 这本书完全配得上他的声望。(8) 我需要你卖这些二和发现更多杰出人物替换。

translation: aux.将；可能；大概；总会；愿意；will的过去式
examples: (1) The president proclaimed that a new currency would be issued.(2) He would have lost his position if you hadn't backed him up.(3) It would take about 30 minutes.(4) Every time he saw me, he would say hello to me.(5) Would you help me with the report?
(1) 总统宣布将发行新货币。(2) 假如你当初没有支持他,他可能已经失去职位了。(3) 大概要开30分钟。(4) 每当他看见我,总向我问好。(5) 你愿意帮我写报告吗？

translation: n.创伤；伤害；伤口v.伤；伤害；缠绕（动词wind的过去式和过去分词）
examples: (1) I hope her emotional wound will heal with the passing of time.(2) She got deep psychological wounds.(3) The soldier received a serious wound on the chest.(4) That was a wound to the child's pride.(5) The wound is healing fast.(6) The wound was bound up by bandage.(7) Two soldiers died and three others were wounded in the attack.(8) He was deeply wounded by their disloyalty.(9) You should pay attention not to wound his pride.
(1) 我希望她感情上的创伤能随时间的流逝而治愈。(2) 她受到很深的心理创伤。(3) 这名士兵胸部受了重伤。(4) 那是对孩子自尊心的伤害。(5) 伤口愈合得很快。(6) 伤口用绷带包扎着。(7) 在这次袭击中,有两名士兵牺牲,三名受伤。(8) 因为他们不忠,他十分伤心。(9) 注意不要伤害他的自尊心。

translation: adj.受伤的n.伤员
examples: (1) The wounded bird fluttered to the ground.(2) The wounded man was in agony.(3) The wounded were bedded in the farmhouse.(4) Many of the wounded died on their way to hospital.
(1) 那受伤的鸟拍著翅膀落到地上。(2) 那受伤的人痛苦已极。(3) 把伤员安置在农家住宿。(4) 许多伤员死在去医院的途中了。

translation: v.摔跤；斗争；努力解决；斟酌n.摔跤比赛；格斗
examples: (1) He wrestled his opponent to the floor/ground.(2) He taught his little brother how to wrestle.(3) We have to wrestle with difficulties.(4) We must wrestle with the problem.(5) The minister wrestled over the wording of the communique.(6) They are going to wrestle a match next month.
(1) 他把对手摔倒在地上。(2) 他教他小弟弟如何摔跤。(3) 我们必须同困难作斗争。(4) 我们必须尽全力解决该问题。(5) 部长斟酌公报的措辞。(6) 他们下月要进行一场摔跤比赛。

translation: n.皱纹；方法vt.使起皱纹；皱着vi.起皱
examples: (1) She's beginning to get wrinkles round her eyes.(2) My findings add a new wrinkle to each scenario.(3) Too much sunbathing will wrinkle your skin.(4) He wrinkled up his forehead in perplexity.(5) The apples are beginning to wrinkle.(6) Spread the varnish thin if you don't want it to wrinkle.
(1) 她的眼角开始有皱纹了。(2) 我的发现为两种说法都提供了一点想法。(3) 皮肤晒得过分就能起皱纹。(4) 他困惑地皱起了眉头。(5) 这些苹果开始起皱纹了。(6) 如果你不想让它起皱就把油漆涂薄。

translation: n.手腕；腕部
examples: (1) He fell downstairs and broke his wrist.(2) She wears a ring round her wrist.(3) I want a pair of wrist protectors.
(1) 他从楼梯跌下，摔伤了手腕。(2) 她的手腕上戴着一只镯子。(3) 我要一副护腕。

translation: n.写作；著述；笔迹；作品
examples: (1) Writing is his life.(2) She is endowed with great writing ability.(3) She doesn't earn much from her writing.(4) Throughout his lifetime Lai Zhide strove to become a sage and was devoted to writing in seclusion with the wish of attaining spiritual immortality.(5) I can't read the doctor's writing.(6) It's really difficult to read your writing.(7) Have you read his writings?(8) His writing contains some real goodies.(9) The word play in his writing is very witty.
(1) 写作是他的生命。(2) 她具有杰出的写作天赋。(3) 她写作得到的收入不多。(4) 在人生态度上，来氏有圣贤之志，毕生隐居著述，而有不朽的愿望。(5) 我看不明白那位医生的笔迹。(6) 你的笔迹真是难以辨认。(7) 你读过他的作品吗？(8) 他的作品中含有真正引人入胜的东西。(9) 他作品中的双关语诙谐风趣。

translation: vt. 摇摆；摇动；饶舌vi. 摆动；喋喋不休；蹒跚而行n. 摇摆；爱说笑打趣的人
examples: Dogs wag their tails when they are pleased.The dog's tail wagged.They often persuaded me to wag school.The news set tongues wagging.His silvery tongue began to wag.The dog greeted its master with a wag of its tail.He's a bit of a wag.Don't play the wag.
狗一高兴就摇尾巴。那只狗的尾巴摇摆着。他们常劝我逃学。那则消息使人们议论纷纷。他那张能说善道的嘴马上活动起来。狗摇着尾巴迎接主人。他爱开点玩笑。不要逃学。

translation: vt. 等候；推迟；延缓vi. 等待；耽搁；伺候用餐n. 等待；等候n. (Wait)人名；(英)韦特；(捷)魏特
examples: She has impatience to wait for the bus.He kept us waiting for ages while he packed his luggage.You will just have to wait your turn.I don't like this long wait.The long wait at the airport is really tedious.All we can do now is wait and hope.
她没有耐心等公共汽车到来。他收拾行李，让我们等了好半天。你得等到轮到你才行。我不喜欢这种长时间的等待。在机场冗长的等待的确乏味。我们现在所能做的就是等候和期待。

translation: n. 服务员，侍者
examples: A waiter of the Japanese restaurant bowed him in.It is customary to tip the waiter.He sent the waiter for a packet of cigarettes.He asked the waiter to bring him a cask of sherry.
那家日本餐馆的侍者鞠着躬将他迎了进去。给侍者小费是一种习俗。他让侍者去拿一盒香烟。他叫侍者给他拿一桶雪利酒。

translation: 等候室；侯诊室
examples: We were shown into the waiting room.She's been sitting in the waiting room since two-thirty.There's always plenty to read in the waiting room.Waiting in doctors' offices makes me grouchy.The porter ushered us into the waiting room.They had to sit in the waiting room for an hour.
我们被领进等候室。自两点半她就坐在等候室了。候诊室里总是有许多可供阅读的。在候诊室等待会让我火气大。服务员把我们引进了候车室。他们不得不在候车室里等了一个小时。

translation: vi. 醒来；唤醒；警觉vt. 叫醒；激发n. 尾迹；守夜；守丧n. (Wake)人名；(英)韦克
examples: I usually wake up early.She spends all her waking hours worrying about her job.The incident woke memories of his past sufferings.Only you, can wake up Snow White!The bad news finally woke the country to the danger of war.We must wake up to the possibility of a war between the two nations.I wish I could wake her up to the danger she is in.We just saw the foaming white wake of the liner.They discovered a new pulsar wake.There's no weeping at an irish wake.
我通常醒得很早。她只要醒著就一直为工作发愁。这件事唤起了他对过去苦难经历的回忆。只有你能唤醒公主！坏消息传来，终于使国人认识到了发生战争的危险。我们必须意识到两国之间可能爆发战争。我希望能唤醒她认识到处境的危险。w我们只看到班轮驶过留下的白沫翻腾的航迹。他们发现了一个新的脉冲星尾迹。爱尔兰式的守灵仪式上没有哭泣。

translation: n. 步行，走；散步vt. 散步；走过vi. 走，步行；散步n. (Walk)人名；(德、葡)瓦尔克；(英)沃克
examples: I missed the bus and had to walk home.The car's kaput we'll have to walk.I will walk you home.The children walk down the street hand in hand.Somebody has walked off with my pen.He just walked the street.After running for two miles he got to a walk.Every morning he will have a walk along this river.The path through the forest is one of my favorite walks.
我没赶上公共汽车，只好走回家。汽车坏了--我们只好步行。我陪你走回家。孩子们手拉手地在街上散步。有人把我的钢笔偷走了。他刚刚走过这条街道。他跑了2公里后开始步行。每天早晨,他总会沿着这条河散步。我最喜欢散步的小路就是穿过树林的那条。

translation: n. 墙壁，围墙；似墙之物vt. 用墙围住，围以墙adj. 墙壁的n. (Wall)人名；(英)沃尔；(德、芬、捷、瑞典)瓦尔
examples: The picture on the wall is crooked.The castle walls are very thick.I will break down its wall, and it will be trampled.We are going to wall the garden.Tall trees wall the broad avenue.I think I might wall off the living room so that we have a separate place to eat.I shall wall in and fence out until I really taste the sweets of property.
挂在墙壁上的画是歪的。城堡的墙很厚。我必撤去篱笆，使它被吞灭，拆毁墙垣，使它被践踏。我们将要用围墙把花园围起来。高大的树木大墙似地排列在宽阔的林阴道旁。我想，我可以砌一堵墙把客厅隔开，好有个单独吃饭的地方。我要在园林周围砌起墙，旁边再用栅栏隔开，直到我真正尝到了产业的甜头。

translation: n. 钱包，皮夹n. (Wallet)人名；(英)沃利特；(法)瓦莱
examples: She placed the receipt in her wallet.I lost my wallet yesterday.My wallet has disappeared from the table.The wallet was just under his nose, but he didn't see it.He pocketed his wallet and car keys.
她把收条放到皮夹子里了。我昨天丢了钱包。我放在桌子上的钱包不见了。钱包就在他眼前，可他没看见。他把钱包和汽车钥匙放进了衣袋里。

translation: vt. 需要；希望；应该；缺少n. 需要；缺乏；贫困；必需品vi. 需要；缺少
examples: I want large ones, not small ones.He wants me to go with him.What they talked about is what we want to know.He is wanted by the police.The plants died from want of water.Their health had suffered from years of want.Thus a computer is soon viewed as a need rather than a want.
我要大的, 不要小的。他希望我同他一起去。他们谈论什么是我们所想要知道的事。警察正通缉他。这些植物因缺水而死。他们长年贫困影响了身体健康。这样,计算机很快就被视为必需品,而非需求品。

translation: n. 战争，斗争；军事，战术；冲突，对抗，竞争vi. 打仗，作战；对抗
examples: The hope of a short war went glimmering.A series of provocations led up to the border war.The army was disbanded when the war came to an end.They are waging a war against crime.
战争无望在短期内结束。一系列的挑衅事件导致了边境战争的发生。战争结束时，军队即被解散。他们正在展开一场反对犯罪的斗争。

translation: adj. 温暖的；热情的vi. 同情；激动；变温暖vt. 使…兴奋；使…温暖；使…感兴趣n. 取暖；加热n. (Warm)人名；(英)沃姆；(德)瓦姆
examples: It's a nice and warm today.Take your coat off. It's warm in the room.He was pleased with their warm welcome.The weather has warmed up.Your feet will soon warm up once you get indoors.Come out of the cold street into the warm.
今天的天气晴朗而且温暖。把外衣脱掉,室内很暖和。他们的热烈欢迎使他很高兴。天气转暖了。你一进屋,脚就会很快暖和起来。街上寒冷，进来暖和暖和。

translation: vt. 警告，提醒；通知vi. 发出警告，发出预告n. (Warn)人名；(英)沃恩；(德)瓦恩
examples: He warned me against going there at night.They warn her that if she do it again she will be sent to prison.The police warn us not to go out at night.I warned them that there might be snakes in the woods.If you can't arrive there on time, you should warn them.Birds sometimes chatter to each other to warn of danger.
他警告我晚上不要到那去。他们警告她说她再这么干就把她关进监狱。警察告诫我们夜间不要出门。我提醒他们树林里可能有蛇。如果你不能按时到达，应该预先通知他们。鸟儿有时互相啁啾,通报危险。

translation: n. 洗涤；洗的衣服；化妆水；冲积物vt. 洗涤；洗刷；冲走；拍打vi. 洗澡；被冲蚀n. (Wash)人名；(英)沃什；(尼日利)瓦什
examples: This dress material shrinks in the wash.We'll toss a coin to see who does the wash.She has a large wash this week.Silk clothing should not use washing machines wash.Cheap clothes tend to fall apart when you wash them.I must wash my hands before dinner.Cotton clothes will shrink if you wash them in hot water.I am afraid you must wash out this stain.
这种衣料一洗要缩水。我们将掷币决定谁来洗衣服。这星期她有大量衣服要洗。丝绸衣物不宜用洗衣机洗涤。便宜衣物洗涤时容易破碎。吃饭前，我必须洗手。如果你用热水洗涤，纯棉衣服会缩小。恐怕你必须洗掉这个污渍。

translation: 洗衣机，洗涤机
examples: The salesperson demonstrated a new washing machine.
推销员示范操作新的洗衣机。

translation: n. 洗手间；盥洗室；厕所
examples: His new house has a big washroom.The washroom is to the left of the entrance, near the stairs.Can you tell me where the washroom is, please?As soon as the class was over, he ran directly to the washroom.
他的新家有一个很大的盥洗室。盥洗室在进口处左边，靠近楼梯。能告诉我厕所在哪儿吗?一下课，他就直奔厕所去了。

translation: n. 浪费；废物；荒地；损耗；地面风化物vt. 浪费；消耗；使荒芜vi. 浪费；变消瘦；挥霍钱财adj. 废弃的；多余的；荒芜的
examples: The city waste is disposed of in the sea.The safe disposal of nuclear waste is a major problem.It's only a waste of time to speak to her.The routine work is a waste of her talents.The city was burnt to a desolate waste.All his efforts were wasted.I don't like to waste your time.Don't waste such a golden opportunity.His body was wasted by long illness.They are turning waste land into paddy fields.Waste water from factories should be treated before flowing into rivers.The Students' Union waged a compaign against waste on the campus.Perfectionists can waste just as much time as procrastinators.
城市垃圾倒在海里处理掉。安全处置核废料是个大问题。和她说话纯粹是浪费时间。做这样千篇一律的工作,是浪费了她的才能。这城市被焚毁成废墟。他的所有努力都白费了。我不愿浪费你的时间。不要糟踏这样一个千载难逢的机会。他久病体弱。他们正在使荒地变为稻田。工厂里的废水在流入河里之前应该经过处理。学生会在校园里发起一场反对浪费的运动。追求完美的人与那些爱拖延的人浪费的时间一样多。

translation: vt. 观察；注视；看守；警戒n. 手表；监视；守护；值班人vi. 观看，注视；守侯，看守
examples: I seldom play chess, but I like to watch.Watch what I do and how I do it.I was assigned to watch the road.We sat there watching basketball.How much is that watch?The police put a watch on the suspect's house.The guards are still on watch at midnight.I was on duty during the morning watch.
我很少下棋，但是喜欢看。注意看我的动作和方法。我被派去护路。我们坐在那看篮球比赛。那块手表多少钱?警方派人监视那个可疑人的住宅。看守在深夜仍在站岗。我值早班。

translation: n. 水；海水；雨水；海域，大片的水vt. 使湿；供以水；给…浇水vi. 加水；流泪；流口水n. (Water)人名；(英)沃特
examples: The rain water drips from the roof.I satisfied my thirst with a glass of water.Oceania is a separate landmass, but it is separated from Asia by very shallow water.The rain water drips from the roof.The sea water foams under the bow.You can water the flowers every three days.The valley is watered by a stream.The owner of the pub was accused of watering the beer.The smoke made my eyes water.They stopped to water the horses.
雨水从屋顶滴下来。我喝了一杯水解渴。大洋洲是一块单独的陆地,但它与亚洲之间只隔着很浅的海域。雨水从屋顶滴下来。海水在船首下面泛起浪花。你可以每三天给花浇一次水。这山谷有一条小溪流过。有人指责酒店老板在啤酒里搀水。烟使我的眼睛流泪。他们停下来让马饮水。

translation: vi. 波动；起伏；挥手示意；摇动；呈波形vt. 卷（烫）发；向…挥手示意；使成波浪形n. 波动；波浪；高潮；挥手示意；卷曲
examples: The boat was smashed by a huge wave.She has a natural wave in her hair.A compression wave in decelerating flow steepens.This wave of excess density is sound.Bill waved his hand to us and then drove away.The flag waved in the wind.All around me I saw tall trees waving in the wind.
小船被一个巨浪掀翻胃。她的头发自然卷曲。压缩波在减速流中变陡。这种过剩密度的波就是声波。比尔向我们挥手告别后开车走了。旗帜在风中飘扬。我看见周围的高树随风飘动。

translation: n. 方法；道路；方向；行业；习惯adv. 大大地；远远地adj. 途中的n. (Way)人名；(中)见 Wei；(英、缅)韦
examples: I am on my way to the grocery store.We lost the way in the dark.He asked me the way to London.He tried in every way to verify this theory.She showed them the way to do it.Reading is a good way to unwind.It's not my way to leave anything half done.Do not form an undisciplined way of life.I don't like the way she speaks.I'm sorry it should be this way.Look both ways before crossing the road.Make sure that the sign's the right way up.I was looking the other way when the goal was scored.They escaped out the back way.We are a long way from the coast.The summer holiday is still far a long way off.I think they live on Birmingham way.I may be able to help you in some way.It is an excellent novel in every way.He's been in a bad way ever since the operation.I have lost my job for three months,so I am in a bad way.I don't know how we're going to manage,the way things are.It seems like I'm always way too busy with work.His ideas were way ahead of his time.She finished the race way ahead of the other runners.

我正在去杂货店的路上。我们在黑夜中迷路了。他问我去伦敦的路。他想一切办法来验证这个理论。她向他们示范做这件事的方法。阅读是休息的好方式。半途而废不是我的作风。不要养成散漫的生活作风。我不喜欢她说话的样子。很遗憾,事情竟会是这个样子。过马路前向两边看一看。一定要把符号的上下弄对。进球时我正看着别处。他们从后门逃走了。我们距离海边很远。暑假还离得远呢!我猜他们生活在伯明翰地区。我也许可以从某个方面去帮助你。无论从哪方面来看，这都是一本优秀的小说。自从手术以后，他的身体状况就很不好。我失业已三个月了，所以我的情形很不妙。按目前这样的情况，我不知道我们要如何应付。我工作总是太忙了。他的思想远远超越了他那个时代。她第一个跑到终点,远远领先于其他选手。

translation: pron. 我们（主格）；笔者，本人（作者或演讲人使用）；朕，寡人n. (We)人名；(缅)韦
examples: We have seen the film.We are fully aware of the gravity of the situation.
我们已经看过这部电影。我们十分清楚形势的严峻性。

translation: adj. [经] 疲软的；虚弱的；无力的；不牢固的
examples: The troops were too weak to withstand.The small weak child became the scorn of the class.He was too weak even to lift his hand.She felt weak from lack of sleep.Your argument is too weak to convince meA person with weak sight cannot see far.According to the direction, we need a weak sugar solution.
军队太弱了,抵挡不住下一次进攻。这个瘦小软弱的孩子成为全班嘲笑的对象。他虚弱得连手都抬不起来。她由于睡眠不足感到浑身无力。你的论点太薄弱了，说服不了我。视力差的人不能看得很远。按照指示，我们要用少放糖的配方。

translation: n. 衣物；磨损；耐久性v. 穿着；用旧；耗损；面露
examples: The inscription on the stone had worn away.Machines soon wear out under rough usage.It was a freak of mine to wear pink pajamas.All visitors to the site must wear safety helmet.She never wears green.She was worn down by overwork.The insurance policy does not cover damage caused by normal wear and tear.The carpet will stand any amount of wear.Nowadays sportswear isn't only for the gym, it has become popular as informal weekend wear.The carpet will stand any amount of wear.
刻在石头上的文字已磨损了。机器如果使用不仔细, 很快就会磨损。穿上粉红色睡衣是我一时的奇想。到工地的所有参观者必须带上安全帽。她从不穿绿色的衣服。她因过度劳累而垮了下来。保险单内容不包括正常使用所导致的损坏。这地毯极其耐用。现在运动服已不限于在体育馆中,它在非正式的周末穿着中也很流行。这地毯极其耐用。

translation: n. 天气；气象；气候；处境vt. 经受住；使风化；侵蚀；使受风吹雨打vi. 风化；受侵蚀；经受风雨adj. 露天的；迎风的n. (Weather)人名；(英)韦瑟
examples: What is the weather like today?The meteorologist drew a picture of the weather.The past years had known him in many weathers.The rocks on the mountain have to be weathered by wind and water.Many small firms did not weather the storm of the recession.They are going to weather the corn in the thrashing field.The paint on the walls had weathered.The stone weathers to a beautiful pale gold.We weather along in spite of the storm.Fill in the form below about the weather report.It depends on how well the weather forecasts hold up.
今天天气情况怎样？气象学者画了一张气象图。过去的岁月里,他起起落落。山上的岩石得经受风化和水蚀。许多小公司没能经受住这次经济衰退的风波。他们要把玉米在打谷场晾晒干。墙壁上的涂料已经风干了。这块石头褪成淡淡的金色。我们冒着暴风雨前进。续下面关于天气预报的表格。这取决于气象预报的准确性如何。

translation: n. 星期三
examples: What day is today? It's Wednesday.I have an appointment on Wednesday.If today is Wednesday, the day after tomorrow will be Friday.The steamers for Shanghai leave on Wednesday.
今天是星期几？今天是星期三。我星期三有个约会。今天要是星期三,后天就是星期五。开往上海的轮船星期三启程。

translation: n. 周，星期
examples: The alterations to your coat will take a week.The boys have decided to go camping next week.I got a new coat in that store last week.The temperature has stayed hot this week.She was absent from factory for three weeks.
你的外衣改一改要花一个星期。男孩子们已决定下个星期去露营。上礼拜我在那家店买了一件新外套。本周气温一直都很热。她三周没有去工厂上班了。

translation: n. 平日，普通日；工作日
examples: I don't stay out late on weekdays.The library is open on weekdays only.You can have your goods delivered on any weekday.
工作日的时候我不在外面呆得很晚。这个图书馆星期一至星期六都开放。您要求在任何工作日装运货物均可。

translation: n. 周末，周末休假；周末聚会adj. 周末的，周末用的vi. 度周末

translation: adv. 很好地；充分地；满意地；适当地adj. 良好的；健康的；适宜的n. 井；源泉v. 涌出n. (Well)人名；(英、德、荷)韦尔
examples: She speaks English very well.I can't sleep well because the tap is dripping.It was well worth waiting for.Let me think for a minute. Well, I guess so.Well, who would have thought it?Is she well enough to travel?We're very well where we are.It would be well to start early.The police found the lost treasure in an abandoned well.She has the well of enthusiasm.She went up through the dark well of the house.
她英语讲得很好。龙头漏水,吵得我睡不好觉。这件事倒是很值得等待。让我想想,好吧,我想可以。嗳, 谁想得到是这样啊?她身体康复, 能够旅行了吗?我们处境很好。最好还是早点动身。警察在一口废弃的井里找到了丢失的财宝。她是热情的源泉。她转身穿过房子阴暗的楼梯井。

translation: n. 西；西方；西部adj. 西方的；朝西的adv. 在西方；向西方；自西方n. (West)人名；(英、德、芬、瑞典)韦斯特
examples: The earth rotates from west to east.The sun rises in the east and sets in the west.I live in the west of the city.The West is the granary of this country.In the West,one can rent furnished rooms.We learned from the west countries.Our salesman covers the west coast.The building faces west.I drove west along the road.
地球从西向东旋转。太阳从东方升起，在西方落下。我住在该城市的西部。西部是这个国家的粮仓。在西方，人们可以租用带家具的房间。我们向西方国家学习。我们的推销员负责西部沿海地区。这座建筑物面朝西。我沿路向西驶去。

translation: adj. 西方的，西部的；有西方特征的n. 西方人；西部片，西部小说n. (Western)人名；(英)韦斯顿
examples: Britain has allied itself with other western powers for trade and defence.Silk handkerchiefs embroidered by hand sell well in the Western market.America is a western country.How does Chinese chess differ from western chess?I'd love to,but I don't know much about Western music.The western part of America was lawless 200 years ago.I'll emigrate to the western woods.Alaska is at the western extremityof North America.India is a mysterious land in the mind of Western.They Filmed a Western on location in the Mexican desert.The Virginian opens up a new field in American western literature.
英国与其他西方强国结成了贸易及防御联盟。手绣的丝制手帕在西方市场销路很好。美国是一个西方国家。象棋和西洋棋有什么不同?我倒想去，但我对西洋音乐了解不多。二百年前，美国西部是没有法纪的。我要移居到西部的丛林里去。阿拉斯加在北美西部的尽头。在西方人的心目中，印度是一片神秘的土地。他们在墨西哥沙漠外景地拍摄一部西部片。牛仔西部小说由此迈出了美国西部文学发展史上的重要一步。

translation: adj. [气象][物] 潮湿的；有雨的n. 雨天；湿气vt. 弄湿vi. 变湿n. (Wet)人名；(英、纳米、南非)韦特
examples: The paper has wrinkled where it got wet.You will get wet if you go out without an umbrella.A bicycle cape will protect you in wet weather.The crowds packed into the cinema on a wet day.I stepped in a puddle and got my foot wet.I will have to wet your hair first.
这张纸湿的地方起皱褶了。你出门不带伞会被淋湿的。自行车雨披可以使你在雨天骑车也不致淋湿。一大群人在雨天挤进了电影院。我踏进一个小水潭，把脚弄湿了。我要先把您的头发弄湿。

translation: pron. 什么；多么；多少adj. 什么；多么；何等adv. 到什么程度，在哪一方面int. 什么；多么
examples: What are you having for dinner?She is not what she was a few years ago.What color is your dress?What political party does he belong to?What a lovely dog!What, do you really want to go?
你晚饭吃什么?她已经不是几年前的她了。你的衣服是什么颜色？他是哪个政党的成员?狗真可爱呀!什么！你真的要去？

translation: n. 小麦；小麦色n. (Wheat)人名；(英)惠特
examples: This old man is a leading authority on wheat diseases.This machine crushes wheat grain to make flour.Wheat is transported from the farms to the mills.The wheat rippled in the breeze.The wheat has cropped well this year.I bought a wheat coat yesterday.
这位老人是小麦病虫害方面的权威。这台机器把麦子磨成面粉。把小麦从农场运到面粉厂。小麦在微风中起伏波动。今年小麦收成很好。昨天我买了件麦色的外套。

translation: n. 车轮；方向盘；转动vt. 转动；使变换方向；给…装轮子vi. 旋转；突然转变方向；盘旋飞行
examples: They found her slumped over the steering wheel.Nobody can roll back the wheel of history.The wheel sheared off and fell to the ground.A wheel must have a shaft on which it may rotate.The sails of the windmill were wheeling round.Its monstrous wings seem to wheel in the leaden air around me.Will you wheel him away because he can't walk?The wheel is revolving about its axis.This wheel engages with that wheel and turns it.
他们发现她倒伏在方向盘上。没有人能够倒转历史的车轮。车轮突然脱落到地上。一个轮子必须要有轴，这样它才能旋转。风车的叶轮正在旋转。它那怕人的翅膀仿佛在我周围沉重的空气中旋转。他不能走路了，你把他推走好吗?轮子在轴上转动。这轮子与那轮子啮合并使它转动。

translation: conj. 考虑到；既然；当…时；在…时；如果adv. 什么时候，何时；（用于时间的表达方式之后）在那时；其时；当时pron. 那时；什么时侯n. 时间，时候；日期；场合
examples: When did that happen?They stood respectfully when he entered the room.Iron will melt when it is made very hot.And they roared when Seaman held up two fingers.I stayed till noon, when I went home.When all is said and done,we still must eat.But when I returned the door was open.How can they learn anything when they spend all their spare time watching television?It was the sort of morning when everything goes wrong.He entered on his inheritance when he was 21.
那件事是什么时候发生的？当他走进房间时，他们都恭恭敬敬地站着。当铁烧得很热时就会熔化的。然后当希曼伸出两根指头的时候他们就吼叫起来。我留到中午，然后就回家了。可是说到底，我们还得吃饭。可是回来时门是开着的。他们把所有的空闲时间都用来看电视了，还能学什麽东西呢？那天上午就是那样，事事不顺心。他21岁时继承了财产。

translation: conj. 每当；无论何时adv. 不论何时；随便什么时候
examples: It's not urgent we can do it next week or whenever.I'd like to see you whenever it's convenient.She gets in a fret whenever we're late.She hated it whenever Spike got the jump on her.Can he take the car out whenever he likes?Please come whenever it is convenient to you.
不是急事--我们可以下星期做或其他时候做。在你方便的时候我想来看看你。只要我们一迟到,她就焦虑不安。无论何时斯派克抢在她之前，她都怀恨在心。他随时都可以把车开出去吗？方便的时候,请随时来。

translation: adv. 在哪里pron. 哪里conj. 在…的地方n. 地点

她从哪儿得到这个消息的？我知道一个你可以野餐的地方。我们後来搬到巴黎不要把它放在孩子们能够到的地方。这就是他居住的地方。不管她在哪里，她都会是幸福的。

translation: adv. 无论什么地方；究竟在哪里conj. 无论在哪里；无论什么情况下
examples: I can fall asleep wherever and in any position.Remember you are a Chinese wherever you go.We'll go wherever you like.
我可以在任何地方任何位置睡着。不论你到哪里,记住你是中国人。你爱去哪儿我们就去哪儿。

translation: conj. 是否；不论pron. 两个中的哪一个
examples: I'm uncertain whether to go or not.His nationality isn't relevant to whether he's a good teacher.Little does he care whether we live or die.Air whether in the gaseous or liquid state is a fluid.I'd always support my country, whether it was right or wrong.Sir Isaac Newton said that time was absolute,that it occurred whether the universe was here or not.
我不能肯定去还是不去。他的国籍与他是否是位好老师无关。他一点也不管我们是死是活。空气，无论是气态的还是液态的，都是一种流体。我会一直支持我的国家,无论它是对是错。爱萨克·牛顿爵士说时间是绝对存在的，无论宇宙存在与否它都存在。

translation: pron. 哪/那一个；哪/那一些adj. 哪一个；哪一些
examples: Which book have you read?Here are the designs. Which ones do you prefer?It's hard to say which is better.Which are the best headache tablets?Want to know which shops Bi Ren went to?
哪一本书你读过了？这就是那些图样。你喜欢哪一些?很难说哪一个好些。哪些药片治头痛最好？想知道碧仁在拍节目时去了哪些商店？

translation: conj. 虽然；然而；当……的时候n. 一会儿；一段时间vt. 消磨；轻松地度过

我求学期间住在青年招待所里。玛丽写信时，孩子们在外面玩耍。总之,虽然前途是光明的,但是道路是曲折的。尽管我承认有问题存在我已经很久没见到他了。她学法律之前在银行工作过一段时间。在吃晚饭以前,我会读一会儿报纸侦探小说有助于打发时间。我不知道如何度过乏味的时刻。

translation: adj. 白色的；白种的；纯洁的n. 白色；洁白；白种人
examples: This parapet is white.He was white with fury.Borax is a kind of white powder.Her reputation is as white as snow.She is white and he is coloured.The white people here don't mix socially with the natives.How do you like coffee, black or white ?The black shows up against the white.White is a very becoming color on you.The mayor is very popular among whites.
这个栏杆是白色的。他气得脸色发白。硼砂是一种白色粉末。她的声誉纯洁无瑕。她是白种人而他是黑人。这里的白种人不与土人交往。你喜欢什么样的咖啡?不加牛奶的还是加牛奶的?在白色的衬托下,黑色很显目。你穿白色衣服很好看。这位市长在白人中很受欢迎。

translation: pron. 谁；什么人

我不得不从头到尾听那令人作呕的故事。全国上下都渴望和平。他是整个事件的发起者。他能把整本英语《圣经》硬背出来。从整体来看，这两幢楼是相似的。你们将会挖掘出一个完整的新历史。这是很完整的。

translation: pron. 谁（who的宾格）
examples: I don't know whom he has in mind for the job.From whom did you learn that he was ill?
我不知道他想让谁来做这项工作。你从谁那儿知道他生病了？

translation: pron. 谁的（疑问代词）
examples: No one knows whose dictionary this is.Whose life have you touched today?No one knows whose dictionary this is.Whose life have you touched today?
无人知道这是谁的字典。今天你会走进谁的生活？无人知道这是谁的字典。今天你会走进谁的生活？

translation: int. 哎呀！什么？adv. 为什么
examples: The reasons why he did it are obscure.That is why I am not in favour of the plan.He expounded the reasons why he did it.She knows why the metal is the good conductor.Why he went there is a mystery to me.Why, it's nearly nine o'clock.Why,it's Bill,as I live and breathe!Why,he is the one of all others I have wanted to see.I cannot explain why.I don't need to hear all the whys and the wherefores, I just want to know what happened.Why he went there is a mystery to me.I'm going to tell you why this conundrum exists.
他做那事的理由还不清楚。那是我不赞成这个计划的理由。他阐述了他做这件事的理由。她知道金属为什么是好的导体。他为什么到那里去，这对我来说是个谜。啊, 快要九点了。哎呀，原来是比尔啦！哎呀，他就是我最想见的人！我说不出理由。我无需听那些大道理,我只想知道是怎么了。他为什么到那里去，这对我来说是个谜。我打算告诉你们为什么这个谜题存在。

translation: vt. 使成寡妇n. 寡妇；孀妇
examples: The widow lamented the death of her only child.The poor widow earns money by taking in washing.I should assist his widow and daughters.All this money was appropriated for the support of his widow.
寡妇为她独生子的死而悲痛。那位可怜的寡妇在家里替人洗衣服度日。我一定要帮助他的遗孀和女儿们。所有这些钱作为给他的遗孀的抚养费。

translation: n. 妻子，已婚妇女；夫人
examples: He kissed his wife and children good-bye.The cruel man abandoned his wife and child.She tried to be an affectionate wife.He first met his wife in Rome.He treats his wife like a slave.She is a good wife and a devoted mother.The President's wife follows his every word.He employed a detective to shadow his wife.Would you please hand this letter to my wife?I think my wife must be fond of them.That will be his wife with him, I suppose.
他吻别他的妻子和孩子。那个狠心的男人抛弃了他的妻儿。她试图做个温柔体贴的妻子。他最初是在罗马碰到他的妻子的。他把妻子当作奴隶看待。她是一位贤妻良母。总统夫人总是注意听他说的话。他雇用了一名私人侦探去跟踪他的夫人。麻烦你把这封信交给我夫人。我想，我夫人一定喜欢。我想，和他一起去的那位一定是他的夫人吧。

translation: n. 意志；决心；情感；遗嘱；意图；心愿vt. 决心要；遗赠；用意志力使vi. 愿意；下决心aux. 将；愿意；必须
examples: A country must have the will to repel any invader.Free will makes us able to choose our way of life.The rich man left his son nothing in the will.She was married against her will.I will do my best.I will make sacrifices solely on your account.You will report to me afterward.He was convinced he could win if he willed it enough.This happened because God willed it.He willed most of his money to charities.Call it what you will, it's still a problem.You're free to travel where you will in the country.
一个国家得有决心击退任何入侵者。自由的意志使我们可以选择自己的生活方式。那位富翁在遗嘱中什么都没给他儿子留下。她结婚是有违本意的。我将会尽力而为。单单为了你,我也愿意作出牺牲。你稍后要向我报告。如果他坚定决心,他确信自己可以赢。发生了这件事是上帝的旨意。他把钱大多遗赠给慈善机构了。不管怎么说,这仍旧是个问题。在这个国家里，你想上哪儿去就可以上哪儿去。

translation: vt. 赢得；在…中获胜vi. 赢；获胜；成功n. 赢；胜利n. (Win)人名；(德、荷、缅)温；(英)温(女子教名Winifred的昵称)
examples: That horse is a cinch to win the next race.She has a fervent desire to win.She needs to win this point to level the score.He is expected to win the game with ease.She sat for scholarship but failed to win it.Her performance won her much critical acclaim.The team has chalked up its fifth win in a row.The unexpected win boosted the team's morale.
那匹马在下一场比赛中肯定赢。她有著强烈的获胜欲望。她要赢得这一分才能将比分扳平。预计他在比赛中会轻易获胜。她参加奖学金考试但未能获得。她的表演大获评论界赞颂。这队一连五次取得胜利。意外的胜利鼓舞了全队的士气。

translation: n. 风；呼吸；气味；卷绕vt. 缠绕；上发条；使弯曲；吹号角；绕住或缠住某人vi. 缠绕；上发条；吹响号角n. (Wind)人名；(英、德、瑞典)温德
examples: A gust of wind blew my hat off.The higher the tree, the stronger the wind.The day was very still, without a breath of wind.I can't eat beans--they give me wind.I need time to get my wind back after that run.The deer got the wind of the hunters.The wind played beautifully.His promises are merely wind.He was momentarily winded by the blow to his stomach.Please wind the horn.The river winds to the sea.She asked me to wind the wool for her.Did you wind your watch this morning ?It was one of those old-fashioned gramophones that winds up.He wound the tape back to the beginning.You have to wind a handle at the side of your telephone.Give the handle another couple of winds.
一阵大风吹走了我的帽子。树越高, 风越大。天空十分平静我不能吃豆子，吃了肚子就胀气。我跑过之后需要时间喘口气。鹿儿觉出了猎人的气息。管乐器部吹奏得美极了。他的诺言仅是空话。他的肚子上挨了一击，一时喘不过气来。请吹号角。那条河蜿蜒地流入大海。她叫我帮她绕毛线。你今天早上把表的发条上了没有?那是一台上弦的老式留声机。他把磁带倒到了开头。你得转动电话机旁的摇柄。再转动两下手柄。

translation: n. 窗；窗口；窗户
examples: The fresh air blew in from the open window.Snowflakes were patting against the window.He looked out of the window.I saw the vase in the window of an antique shop.He looked at the shop window with greedy eyes.The car ran slap into the shop window.To run a window, just double-click on the icon.Love in its greatest opens the window of life.
新鲜空气从开着的窗户吹进来。雪花轻轻拍打着窗户。他向窗外看去。我在一家古玩店的橱窗里看见了那个花瓶。他用贪婪的眼光看着商店的橱窗。汽车猛地撞入商店的橱窗。要运行视窗，只需双击图标即可。爱最伟大之处，就是打开了人生的视窗。

translation: adj. 多风的，有风的；腹胀的；吹牛的
examples: It's windy today.Hold on to the hat on a windy day.In spring, it's warm, sunny and windy.The weather has turned cold and windy.
今天有风。在有风的日子里请紧紧抓住帽子。春天是一个温暖、多日照和多风的季节。天气变得寒冷而多风.

translation: n. 酒，葡萄酒；紫红色vi. 喝酒vt. 请…喝酒n. (Wine)人名；(英)瓦恩
examples: He likes to drink red wine at supper.The wine is left to mature in oak barrels.He drank the wine slowly, savoring every drop.This deeply coloured red wine is a blend of 4 varieties.This wine has a purplish-red color with bluish tints.I used to wine with my meals.Our hosts wined and dined us very well.
他喜欢在晚饭时喝红葡萄酒。葡萄酒在橡木桶中陈酿。他慢慢地喝着酒，细细品尝着每滴酒的滋味。由四款葡萄混酿而成，酒液呈深紫红色。此酒呈紫红色并泛有蓝色的光泽。我过去吃饭时常常配点酒喝。主人设酒宴盛情款待我们。

translation: n. 胜利者n. (Winner)人名；(英、德、瑞典)温纳
examples: The winner beamed with satisfaction.The winner was presented with a trophy.Who's the winner of the tennis match?
获胜者满意地笑了。获胜者得到了奖品。这次网球赛的优胜者是谁？

translation: n. 冬季；年岁；萧条期vi. 过冬adj. 冬天的；越冬的n. (Winter)人名；(英、德、匈、罗、捷、西、芬、瑞典、法)温特
examples: Winter is the coldest season in a year.Winter is the low season at seaside hotels.Every winter some old people die from hypothermia.The bears den up together during the winter.The severeness of the winter made her weaker.Mary can get by with her old coat this winter.They have stored up much fuel for the winter.The grape should be heled in the earth in winter.
冬季是一年中最冷的季节。冬季是海滨旅馆业的淡季。每年冬天都有些老人死于体温过低。冬天熊一起在洞穴里冬眠。冬天的严酷使她身体更加虚弱。旧大衣能满足玛丽今年冬天的需要。他们已储存大量过冬用的燃料。冬天要把葡萄藤埋入土中以过冬。

translation: n. 希望；祝福；心愿vt. 祝愿；渴望；向…致问候语vi. 愿望；需要n. (Wish)人名；(英)威什
examples: If possible, I wish to work in sales department.I wish you a good journey.Do you wish to say anything?His wish to be an actor has come true.The Asian confederation has said it would leave its four executive committee members to vote as they wish rather than give an order.I have no wish to be an official.We all send our best wishes (for your recovery).
如果可能的话,我希望在销售部工作。祝你一路平安。你想要说什么吗？他想当演员的愿望实现了。亚足联声称将由其四位执委按照他们自己的意愿进行投票，而不会下命令。我没有当官的愿望。我们都祝你早日康复。

translation: prep. 用；随着；支持；和…在一起n. (With)人名；(德、芬、丹、瑞典)维特
examples: They muffled up her head with a blanket.The risk of severe illnesses increases with age.The week cost us over 500 but that was with skiing lessons.I leave the baby with my mother every day.I assure you they'll be perfectly safe with us.
他们用毯子蒙住了她的头。患重病的风险随着年龄的增加而增加。这一周花了500多英镑，但其中包括滑雪课的学费。我每天都把婴儿交给我母亲照料。我向你保证, 他们和我们在一起十分安全。

translation: prep. 没有；超过；在…外面adv. 户外；在外面；没有或不显示某事物n. 外部；外面
examples: Without the sun, nothing would grow.It is hard to sleep without a cooler in this room.I just want an ordinary car without the frills.The rumor was without foundation.He lives in a cottage three miles without the town.Never mind, we can manage without.He decorated his house within and without.
没有太阳，就不会有生物。没有空气调节器，在这间屋里很难入睡。我只要一辆没有多余装饰的普通汽车。那条谣言毫无根据。他住在城外三英里一所村舍里。不要紧，没有也能对付。他装修房屋的里面和外面。

translation: n. 妇女；女性；成年女子
examples: She is a career woman rather than a housewife.The chief conductor turned out to be a young woman.She seems a pleasant woman.Her mother is a woman with great refinement.
她是职业妇女而不是家庭主妇。列车长原来是一位青年妇女。她似乎是一个友善的女人。她母亲是一个非常文雅的女人。

translation: n. 惊奇；奇迹；惊愕vi. 怀疑；想知道；惊讶vt. 怀疑；惊奇；对…感到惊讶adj. 奇妙的；非凡的n. Wonder，旺德（人名）n. Wonder，《奇迹男孩》（电影名）
examples: There was a look of wonder in his eyes.They were filled with wonder at the new waterfall.Colour television is realty a wonder.It's a wonder that the child came through without a scratch.I shouldn't wonder if he wins the prize.Do you seriously wonder that she didn't help him?I wonder if this picture can be restored.I wonder whether you are interested in doing processing business with us.I wonder if he will make a good captain.I wonder if you have so much time to do so much work.We have become explorers and scientists with our need to ask questions and to wonder.
他眼中露出惊奇的神色。他们对新瀑布感到非常惊奇。彩色电视真是一个奇迹。这孩子竟能安然无恙地脱险，真是奇迹。如果他获奖，我不会感到惊奇。她没有帮助他,你感到特别惊奇吗?我很想知道这幅画能否修复。我想知道你们是否对与我们进行加工贸易感兴趣。我怀疑他能否当一位好队长。我怀疑你是否有那充多时间去做那多工作。为了解答疑问和探索奇妙的自然，我们成为探险家和科学家。

translation: adj. 极好的，精彩的，绝妙的；奇妙的；美妙；胜；神妙
examples: Never before have I seen such a wonderful film .Let's share the wonderful dolphin show together.Rowing is a wonderful water sport.All of us were strung highly by his wonderful goal.The vase made by the artisan is wonderful.The smooth contour of the sculpture is wonderful.It's a wonderful chaise!The child's skill is wonderful for his age.Autumn is a wonderful season.The new invention contains wonderful possibilities.She had a wonderful opportunity, but she muffed it.
我从未看过如此精彩的影片。让我们一起欣赏海豚的精彩的表演吧。赛艇是一项精彩的水上运动。我们都为他的精彩进球兴奋不已。那个手艺人做的花瓶棒极了。雕塑物平滑的轮廓线简直太美了。多么精致的一辆马车啊！这个孩子小小年纪，技巧令人称奇。秋天是极好的季节。新发明具有极好的未来。她有一个绝好的机会，但是她错过了。

translation: n. 木材；木制品；树林vi. 收集木材vt. 植林于；给…添加木柴n. (Wood)人名；(英、法、西、葡、阿拉伯)伍德
examples: Our wood supply proved insufficient.We can use plastics in place of wood or metal.The man cleft a block of wood in two with an ax.Pine is a soft wood and teak is a hard wood.You should put some more wood in the fire.We rambled through the woods.
我们的木材供应证明是不够的。我们可用塑料来代替木材或金属。那人用斧头把一块木头劈成两半。松木是软木，柚木是硬木。你应该再往火里添些木料。我们漫步走过树林。

translation: n. 羊毛；毛线；绒线；毛织品；毛料衣物n. (Wool)人名；(英)伍尔
examples: These goats are specially bred for their wool.He found a job of shearing wool from sheep.She asked me to wind the wool for her.She passed me a skein of wool.They used only natural pigments to dye the wool.Autumn is a lively season for the wool market.
这些山羊是专为剪取羊毛而饲养的。他找到一份剪羊毛的工作。她叫我帮她绕毛线。她递给我一绞毛线。他们只用天然颜料染毛织品。秋天是毛织品畅销的季节。

translation: n. [语] 单词；话语；消息；诺言；命令vt. 用言辞表达n. (Word)人名；(英)沃德
examples: Could we have a word before you go to the meeting?Tell me what happened in your own words.My friend sent word that he was well.
你去开会之前，咱们能私下说句话吗？用你自己的话把发生的事情告诉我。我朋友捎来口信说他很好。

translation: n. 工作；[物] 功；产品；操作；职业；行为；事业；工厂；著作；文学、音乐或艺术作品vt. 使工作；操作；经营；使缓慢前进vi. 工作；运作；起作用n. （英、埃塞）沃克（人名）
examples: She had been out of work for a year.It's difficult to find work in present economic climate.My line of work pays pretty well.Tell me something about your daily work.Police work involves so much paperwork these days.There is plenty of work to be done in the garden.She often brings work (eg files, documents) home with her from the office.Living near work is very convenient.It takes hard work to achieve success.It was a terrible piece of work you turned in the other day.The damage is clearly the work of vandals.Roth says official misconduct cannot be dismissed as the work of a few bad apples.He has read many of Hemingway's works.She works for an engineering company.He has worked in the factory since last year.He is working on a new novel.She worked herself to a frazzle.We must work for equal rights for everyone.He works a large area(= selling a company's goods, etc.).Your car radio works very well.Do you know how to work the coffee machine?The medicine worked.Your age can work against you in this job.The solidity of the evidence worked in his favor.Her exercise programme has worked miracles for her.Her face worked as she stared at him in terror.Rain has worked in through the roof.It will take a while for the drug to work out of your system.

她已失业一年了。在目前这种经济气候下很难找到工作。我的职业报酬颇丰厚。告诉我你每天的工作内容。现在警察也要做大量的文书工作。园子里有许多事要做。她常把办公室的工作带回家去做(如文件等)。在工作地点附近居住非常方便。成功需要努力工作。那天你交的作业太糟糕了。这毁损显然是些恣意破坏公物的人所为。罗思说，官方的胡作非为决不能被忽略为仅仅是几个坏家伙的行为。他读过许多海明威的作品。她在一家工程技术公司工作从去年开始，他就在工厂里工作。他正在写一本新的小说。她工作得疲惫不堪。我们必须为每个人争取同等的权利。他负责一个大地区的工作。你的汽车收音机性能很好。你会使用咖啡机吗?药物奏效了。你的年纪会妨碍你干这个工作。那项证据的确凿性对他有利。她的健身计划对她很有效。她惊恐地注视着他，脸也吓得抽动起来。雨水透过房顶逐渐渗进屋子里。这药得需要一段时间才能排出你的体外。

translation: n. 工人；劳动者；职蚁n. (Worker)人名；(英)沃克
examples: The worker's overalls were badly burned by acid.The boss dispenses the sick worker from his duties.She has been held up as a model worker.A health worker immunizes an infant in Nepal.
这位工人的工作装被酸腐蚀得很厉害。老板准许生病的工人不上班。她被推举为模范工作者。医疗工作者在尼泊尔为婴儿注射预防针。

translation: n. 工作场所；车间
examples: The balanced workplace isn't exactly new.Workplace harassment can take many forms.
均势工作场所确切地说并不是新名词。构成工作场所骚扰的形式有很多种。

translation: n. 世界；领域；世俗；全人类；物质生活
examples: He is the richest man in the world.There is a map of the world on the wall.Long ago, people believed that the world was flat.The world's natural ecosystems act as a buffer.Much of the world is covered by sea.He wanted to tell the news to the world.The world certainly knows from whence.British television is the envy of the world.I'll prove to the world that he was right.Many affairs of the world are all such.Let us light up the world with our brainchild!All the beautiful sentiments in the world weigh less than a single action.I already began to feel that much of what the world was seeking was superficial.The world of science always contains a few anomalies.We should steadily open more fields to the outside world.Mr. Wang has been a smash hit in the business world.I suppose all the compositions are world famous pieces.World energy demand is increasing at a rate of about 3% per year.

他是世界上最富有的人。墙上有张世界地图。很久以前人们相信地球是平的。地球上的自然生态系统起着一种缓冲的作用。地球的很大一部分都被大海覆盖着。他要把这件事告诉每一个人。世人当然了解小布什的血缘身世。英国电视节目令世人羡慕。我将向世人证明他是对的。世间的许多事情都如此。让我们的色彩为世间增添欢笑。世间所有美丽的情感抵不过一次可爱的行动。我开始觉得很多世间所追寻的东西是很浮浅的。科学领域里总会出现反常情况。稳步扩大对外开放领域。王先生在商业领域里十分成功。我想所有的曲子都是世界名曲吧。世界能源的需求量正以每年百分之三的速度递增。

translation: 蜚声世界（乐曲名）
examples: Chen Jing-run was noted as one of the world famous scientists in maths.Quite a number of world famous paintings are on show in this exhibition.
陈景润作为数学界世界著名的科学家而闻名于世。有许多的世界名画在本次展览会上展出。

translation: n. 虫，蠕虫；蜗杆；螺纹；小人物vt. 使蠕动；给除虫；使缓慢前进vi. 慢慢前进；蠕行n. (Worm)人名；(德、丹、葡)沃尔姆
examples: The worm was crushed under the feet.The bird had a worm in its beak.The most infamous is known as the Internet Worm.When you open the file, it activates the worm.I have no idea as to how to worm out of the job.They have to worm their way through the narrow tunnel.I think we would better worm the cat .The vet prescribed a medicine to worm my puppy.He manages to worm into an important position in the government.
虫被脚踏扁了。鸟儿嘴里叼着一条虫。其中最臭名昭著的是因特网蠕虫。当你一打开文档,就会启动电脑蠕虫。我不知如何摆脱这项任务。他们得钻过狭窄的隧道。我想我们最好给猫打打虫。兽医开了一种药驱除我那小狗体内的寄生虫。他设法钻进政府窃据要职。

translation: adj. 担心的
examples: It was what she left unsaid that worried me.Gorman worried that the problems be solved.
叫我担心的是她觉察到而未说出的。戈尔曼担心的难题迎刃而解。

translation: n. 担心；烦恼；撕咬vt. 担心；发愁；折磨vi. 担心；烦恼；撕咬
examples: The dog was worrying a rat.Don't worry her; she is busy.The noise doesn't seem to worry them.What worries me is how he will manage now his wife's died.Don't worry me with your complaints.Don't worry if you can't finish it.Your parents are worrying about you: do write to them.There's nothing to worry about.Don't worry about that mark, it will brush off.Worry and illness had made him prematurely old.The mother of the kidnapped child was crazy with worry.He's been a source of discord and worry.He have a lot of financial worry at the moment.That car has caused me no end of worry.My chief worry is that he doesn't have experience.Her tender looks seemed to smooth away his worry.

那条狗撕咬著一只老鼠。别去烦她，她很忙。这种嘈声好像并不影响他们。他妻子死了不要老是抱怨,搞得我不太平。你做不完也不必担心。你父母正担心你呢，快给他们写封信吧。没什么可担心的。不要为那个污渍操心，那是可以刷得掉的。他心事重重、 疾病缠身，落得个未老先衰。那个被绑架的孩子的母亲担心得几乎发狂了。他成为不和和烦恼的根源。他现在有很多财务上的烦恼事。那辆汽车给我带来了无穷的烦恼。我的主要忧虑是他没有经验。她的温柔的神情似乎消除了他的忧虑。

translation: adj. 更坏的；更差的；更恶劣的（bad的比较级）；（病情）更重的（ill的比较级）adv. 更糟；更坏；更恶劣地；更坏地n. 更坏的事；更恶劣的事
examples: The weather is getting worse and worse.As time goes by my memory seems to get worse .It's even worse if you have a balcony.I'm afraid he is getting steadily worse.He is behaving worse than ever.She has been taken worse recently.We thought that the situation was as bad as it could be, but worse was to follow.
天气越来越坏。随着时间的流逝，我的记忆力越来越差。如果你有阳台的话情况会更糟。恐怕他的病情越来越严重了。他的所作所为比以前更坏。最近她的病况更恶化了。我们还以为那是最坏的情况呢，可没想到更糟的还在后面。

translation: adj. 最差的，最坏的；最不利的；效能最低的n. 最坏；最坏的时候adv. 最坏地；最不利地n. (Worst)人名；(英、德)沃斯特
examples: That was the worst airline disaster in history.I've seen bad work,but this is the worst.I think the guards in this city are the worst.It is a worst psychological moment for him.Hope for the best, but prepare for the worst.Worst of all, the autofocus doesn't work for video.If the worst comes to the worst, we can always deal with it.It's the old and the poor who suffer worst when subsidies are cut.Of the three of us, I typed worst.
那是历史上最严重的空难。我见过做得很差的工作，但这是最差的。我认为这城市的卫兵是最差的。目前是敌人心理上最不利的时刻。抱最好的愿望，做最坏的打算。最糟的是视频拍摄时无法启用自动对焦。事情再糟,我们总可以应付。补助津贴一削减，最吃苦头的就是那些老人和贫民。我们三人中,我打字打得最差。

translation: adj. 值…的n. 价值；财产n. (Worth)人名；(英)沃思；(德)沃特
examples: The thieves stole 1 million pounds' worth of jewellery.Just 44 years old, his net worth tops $20 billion.The movie was definitely worth seeing.Whatever is worth doing at all is worth doing well.The house is worth a lot of money.
窃贼偷走了价值100万英磅的珠宝。年仅44岁，他的财富纯价值已高达200亿美元。那部电影真的很值得看。任何值得做的事就值得做好。这栋房子值很多钱。

translation: vi. 写，写字；写作，作曲；写信vt. 写，书写；写信给；著述
examples: I've been writing for three hours.Nature inspired him to write such beautiful poems.But there are some parts of the world where even now people cannot write.The new doctor smiled smugly as he continued to write on his clipboard.Britten was born in 1913 and began to write music while he was still very young.
我已经写了三个小时了。自然赋予他灵感,使他写出如此优美的诗句。但直到现在,世界上有些地方的人们还不会书写。这位新医生得意地笑了笑,接着填写病例卡。布里顿生于1913年，很小就开始作曲。

translation: adv. 错误地；邪恶地，不正当地n. 坏事；不公正adj. 错误的；失常的；不适当的vt. 委屈；无理地对待；诽谤n. (Wrong)人名；(英)朗
examples: I am afraid you've made a wrong decision.I'm not going to bow down to such wrong opinions.There is something wrong with the car.What's wrong with the engine? It's making an awful noise.A correct word used in a wrong cultural or religious context is a wrong word.It is wrong to steal.You've spelt the word wrong.Children must be taught the difference right and wrong.Her son can do no wrong in her eyes.People who do wrong are punished.Extreme right is extreme wrong.But they are not in the wrong at all.Wrong must be righted when they are discovered.The teacher has done his students a great wrong.You wronged him by saying that he had lied.You wrong me if you think I only did it for selfish reasons.He was wronged by the federal judges and the authorities.The important thing is not to wrong any woman .

恐怕你做了一个错误的决定。我不打算听从这种错误的意见。这车有点毛病。发动机出什麽故障了? 噪音太大了.一个正确的字用在一个不适当的文化或宗教背景里，也将成为一个错字。偷窃是不道德的.你把这个单词拼错了。必须教儿童分清是非。在她眼里，她的儿子不可能做坏事。犯罪的人要受处罚。正确走向极端即成谬误。但是他们完全没有错误。发现了错误一定要纠正。这个老师对待他的学生们十分不公正。你说他说谎是冤枉了他。如果你觉得我做这件事只是为了自己的话，你就冤枉我了。他被法官和当局冤枉了。重要的是不要不公正地对待任何妇女。

translation: 等候
examples: They waited for the ferry to return.It irks us to wait for people who are late.We are waiting for the first crops to ripen.He was then sitting on thorns and waiting for you.
他们等候渡船返回。等候迟到的人使我们厌烦。我们正等待着第一次农作物的成熟。他当时如坐针毡，焦急地等待着你。

translation: 醒来；开始警觉；开始了解真相
examples: I didn't wake up until I heard the alarm clock.She woke up in the middle of an exciting dream.I want to change my wake up time.If I fall asleep at the wheel wake me up.
直到听到闹钟的铃声我才醒来。她从一场兴奋的梦境中醒来。我想改变叫醒时间。如果我开车时睡着了，就叫醒我。

translation: 解决；算出；实现；制定出；消耗完；弄懂；锻炼
examples: I believe that you can work out this problem by yourself.We can find a way to work out this problem.The police worked out a plan to catch the thief.The general worked out a new plan of attack.I've worked out your share of the expenses at 10.I work out regularly to keep fit.The basketball players are working out at the gym.The mine has been worked out.
我相信你自己能做出这道题的。我们可以找到解决这个问题的方法。警察制定出了策略捉贼。将军制定了新的进攻方案。我已经计算出你应分摊的费用是10英镑。我经常做运动以保持健康。篮球运动员们正在体育馆进行训练。这个矿已经被开采完了。

translation: 焦虑…；担心…
examples: I don't think you need to worry about this.Mother's illness was always a great worry to me.Don't bother about that trifling matter.The good news took away all his worry and anxiety.
我认为你不必为这事担心。母亲的病一直是我非常担心的事。别为那件小事烦恼。好消息使他不再烦恼和焦虑。

translation: 包裹；圆满完成；（使）穿得暖和（wrap somebody/yourself up）；注意力完全集中于……
examples: She tried to wrap up a censure in a polite formula.Mr.Green dressed up as a policeman in dark glasses.You can't keep up the pretense any longer.He is wrapped up in his scientific studies.Be sure to wrap up your son in wool.If you wrap up in several garments, you will keep warm.Do you want me to wrap up the books for you?I can't wrap up the peace talk in less than fifty pages.
她试图用客套的话掩饰指责之意。格林先生伪装成一名戴墨镜的警察。你无法继续伪装下去了。他全神贯注地进行他的研究工作。一定要给你儿子穿上毛衣。如果你穿上几件衣服，你就能保暖。要我为您把书包起来吗？我无法以不到50页纸的篇幅写出和平会谈总结。

translation: 写下；减低账面价值；把…描写成
examples: Write down your address at the check back please.He wrote down the outline of his lecture.
请在支票背面写下你的地址。他写下演讲的提纲。

translation: 写信给……
examples: It is out of question that I will write to you.She never fails to write to her parents every month.If I knew his address, I could write to him.I will write to you of course, but not every week.We write to each other regularly.If you should write to her, send her my love.Please remind me to write to my mother tomorrow.Chiefly, I asked you to remember to write to your dear mother.
我一定会给你写信的。她每个月一定写信给她的父母亲。如果我知道他的住址，我会写信给他。我当然会写信给你，但不是每星期都写。我们彼此经常通信。如果你给她写信，请代我向她问候。请提醒我明天给我母亲写信。我主要是想提醒你写信给你母亲。
